name: Ravit Rose
seeking: partnerships with legal professionals, collaboration with family therapists
offering: expertise in divorce processes, workshops on divorce management

what_you_do: Irooze provides strategic divorce planning, coaching, and resources to help families navigate divorce through amicable, resolution-oriented approaches rather than traditional litigation.
who_you_serve: Parents in the USA or Canada who are contemplating divorce, separated, or divorced.
social_proof: Author of 'Unwanted Nasty Divorces'; founder describes herself as a 'Divorce Scientist' based on years of research; company established since 2016.
signature_programs: Unwanted Nasty Divorces (book), The Irooze Method, Irooze Self-Assessment
business_focus: Revolutionizing the divorce journey by replacing conflict with clarity and equipping parents with expert coaching, trusted professionals, and transformative tools.
service_provided: Divorce planning, divorce coaching, self-assessment, divorce directory, contemplating divorce guidance, separation support, parenting support, emotional healing, blending families support, 1:1 sessions, group cohorts, self-learning
